short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to change size, color of any page text, change background color for better reading experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Relax Eye Page is a Google Chrome extension that lets you customise how text appears in your browser for better user experience, and to relax eyes while reading.
